title: Bug: Cannot log in
content: An error occurs when logging in with certain users. Investigating detailed reproduction steps.

title: Feature: Add dark mode
content: Add a dark mode to the UI and allow users to toggle it.

title: Improvement: Performance optimization
content: Dashboard rendering is slow. Review API responses and rendering logic.

title: Bug: Notifications not received
content: Some users are not receiving push notifications.

title: Refactor: Code cleanup
content: Split component responsibilities and remove unnecessary props.

title: Docs: Update API documentation
content: Update API docs to reflect new endpoints.

title: Test: Add E2E tests
content: Create E2E tests for main user flows.

title: Bug: Image upload fails
content: Uploading large image files results in a timeout.

title: Request: CSV export feature
content: Allow users to download data lists as CSV files.

title: CI: Setup auto-deploy
content: Configure CI/CD to auto-deploy to production on main branch merges.
